import React from 'react' import { Card, CardMedia, CardContent, CardActions, Typography, Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import useStyles from './CartCardStyles'; function CartCard({ product }) { const classes = useStyles() const src = 'https://static.nike.com/a/images/t_PDP_1728_v1/f_auto,b_rgb:f5f5f5/2d9af5a0-de12-4fc1-ac5c-43a085a23cb1/react-vision-womens-shoes-kGhsR6.png' return (
{product.name} {product.price}
{product.quantity}
) } export default CartCard;
